steps.name: Given I log in to the application
And I am on the coach profile update page
When I enter "123" in the name field
And I enter "Head Coach" in the title field
And I enter "Experienced coach" in the about field
And I click on save changes button there
Then I should see an error message for the empty field at "name" as "Name can only contain letters and spaces"
